segments.text: The kitchen looks bright with that window letting in light.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink faucet's still running, water spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How did that happen without anyone turning it off?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate, completely tuned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's wet now from the puddle she stands in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, waiting amid the slop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boyâ€”wow, that stool's tipping back!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's arm is up, begging for one too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so bold, raiding the jar right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden's calm view makes the inside seem even wilder.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinets, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such a mix of calm and craziness here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tied-back curtains frame it all perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR
